Text: FW Compliments from another HBS alum on your poise at Commonweal th Club speaking engagementThis bounced back form your HBS email address so I am resending it directly Original Message From Thomas Moffet Sent Thursday June PM To Subject Compliments from another HBS alum on your poise at Commonwealth Club speaking engagement Ive just come back from listening to your talk and responses to QA at the raucous California Commonwealth Club meeting tonight As an HBS MBA a dozen years ahead of you I wanted to drop you a note to say how well I thought you handled the highly charged atmosphere and the pieintheface assault Usually our meetings are more civil Your economic arguments and portrayal of the deeply flawed regulatory structure were on point in my view Unfortunately I am skeptical that we shall have anything other than a solution skewed by political expediency in California and shall be paying the high cost of those blunders for many years to come I hope your message gets through to our legislators and urge you to continue to speak to Californian audiences despite the unpleasant reception you will probably get I think you made a real step forward in bridging the gap in public understanding tonight Best regards Tom Thomas H Moffet HBSF
